text: Escapeing from a group of violent bandits, Nasrudin sought refuge in the mountains. There he found a man with a disgrace, dressed in a cloak made of jars. There's no time to waste, the mule cried. You have to hide; some killers come running up my heels. "I'm a dervish", the man replied. I spend all my time in meditation and prayer. God will not allow evil to befall His servant. I'm sure Nasrudin did, but I, if I were you, would take some extra precautions, just in case. FIN
title: Por si acaso
author: nan Anónimo
